reviewText: There are so many misconceptions about Iranian women, thanks to the mainstream media! This film, without much fanfare, has managed to beautifully capture the lives of Iranian women from different walks of life. Even for I, as an Iranian-American, this film was educational and informative. It was truly refreshing and inspiring to see how Iranian women are overcoming barriers to climb to the top. A big thank you to Antje for this great work. I'm not at all surprised that she won the top prize at Santa Cruz Film Festival. You can read more about this at: [...]
